## The best boy
This is Grizzly. He is a very good sweet boy who I feel deserves his own page. 

<img src="images/good_good_boy.jpg" style="width:75%">


### Grizzly's interests

* Relaxing in the grass on a sunny day
* Staring at me, upside down
* Trying to convince people he **is** a lap dog, and should be allowed to sit on you
* Deli ham

### Illegal acts, according to Grizzly

* Leaving the house (unless for walks)
* Loud noise
* Football (see above)
